children.subject: No. The late drop is a 'no questions asked' process as long as you're checking all of those boxes you mentioned. The only reason I've heard of the form being denied is that it was submitted past the late drop deadline.

history.content: Assuming that I have not used my one-time only late drop, I am not going under unit, and I don't have any academic dishonesty issues; basically I just want to normally drop a course that I don't like in the middle of the semester. Could L&S possibly deny my late drop?
history.subject: Could late drop requests be denied for L&S?

history.content: Assuming that I have not used my one-time only late drop, I am not going under unit, and I don't have any academic dishonesty issues; basically I just want to normally drop a course that I don't like in the middle of the semester. Could L&S possibly deny my late drop?
